comment: The sheer viciousness of attacks on for affirming that " sex is real " remind me how Galileo was sent to the Inquisition for saying the Earth moves around the Sun . Doctors & scientists are denying science for fear of the mob .
amr:

                  :mod (s2 / sheer))

                                    :op1 "Galio"))
                        :ARG2 (o / organization

                                    :op1 "Quinto"))

                                          :ARG1 (p2 / planet
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Earth"))
                                          :ARG2 (a3 / around

            :ARG2 (ii / i))

            :ARG1 (s7 / science)

comment: I think the disappointment lies with her hashtag . She wrote stories that many kids who felt different / were treated as less because of their differences clung to . Her supporting someone who is desperately trying to exclude ppl she doesnt understand is heartbreaking , I'm sure
